description:
It’s a dream come true for Caswell and Bronk when their favorite duelist in the world challenges them to a duel!  Unfortunately for these two fans, that dream is about to become a nightmare!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Jigoku no Tag Due!l! Akuma no Hero IV
Tag Duel of Hell! Fiendish Hero IV
地獄のタッグデュエル! 悪魔のヒーローIV
